title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 831/1999 of 21 April 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 1489/97 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2847/93 as regards satellite-based vessel monitoring systems
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 831/1999
of 21 April 1999
amending Regulation (EC) No 1489/97 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2847/93 as regards satellite-based vessel monitoring systems
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex III to Regulation (EC) No 1489/97 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 April 1999.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
